data.title: Taipei Airport Map, Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Code

data.text:
Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, Taipei, Taiwan [ TPE / RCTP ]

If you are planning to travel to Taipei or any other city in Taiwan, this airport locator will be a very useful tool. This page gives complete information about the Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport along with the airport location map, Time Zone, lattitude and longitude, Current time and date, hotels near the airport etc... Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Map showing the location of this airport in Taiwan. Taipei Airport IATA Code, ICAO Code, exchange rate etc... is also provided.

Taipei Airport Info:

Taipei Airport IATA Code: TPE Taipei Airport ICAO Code: RCTP Latitude : 25.0777 Longitude : 121.233 City : Taipei Country : Taiwan World Area Code : 781 Airport Type : Large Taipei Airport Address / Contact Details :

No. 9, Hangzhan S. Rd., Dayuan Township, Taoyuan County 33758, Taiwan R.O.C., Phone: +886-3-273-3728, Email: customer-service@mail.taoyuan-airport.com Taipei Website : http://www.taoyuan-airport.com/english/Index/ Airport Type : Public Owner : Government of the Republic of China Operator : Taoyuan International Airport Corporation Hub for : China Airlines, EVA Air, Tigerair Taiwan, TransAsia Airways, V Air No. Of Terminals : 2 Established Year : 1979 Timezone : Asia/Taipei Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Timezone : GMT +08:00 hours Current time and date at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport is 15:36:45 PM (CST) on Monday, Aug 19, 2024
